law.catch_line: Prohibition on using leased spaces for residential purposes.

text.section: An operator shall not knowingly permit a leased space at a self-service storage facility or in a self-contained storage unit to be used for residential purposes.
An occupant shall not use a leased space at a self-service storage facility or in a self-contained storage unit for residential purposes.

law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 360, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988.
